description.narrative: Output 3.2 Enhanced national capacity and partnerships to provide equitable access to safe drinking water and adequate sanitation.

Water supply - safety/quality/treatment (including household treatment and safe storage)

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 3.2 Enhanced national capacity and partnerships to provide equitable access to safe drinking water and adequate sanitation.

description.narrative: National capacity was enhanced in 2019 through the conducting of the Joint Sector Review, which resulted in a joint costed workplan for WASH which provides critical and unified direction for the sector. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019

actual.value: 2019:Costing for WASH BAT and Sector Plan complete
